name: Mouse House: Puzzle Story
description:
Get ready for adventure in a new match-3 game, Mouse House: Puzzle Story. Play an exciting Cat and Mouse quest and help smart little Billy restore his tiny town after a furry fiasco. Swap pieces to earn stars, then use them to decorate a room, restaurant, garden, supermarket and even a railway station. Let your imagination run wild with unlimited home design options: makeover the entire mouse city as much as you want!

Mouse House features:

● Everything that you love about match-3 gameplay: solve puzzles to restore Mouse Town, get explosive boosters, explore diverse levels!
● Beautiful graphics: enjoy rich colors, sweet, tiny houses and cute characters.
● An entire city to decorate: use your design skills not only on one mansion, café or garden — renew literally everything in the town.
● Exciting story: the tiny world of mice is bigger than you thought! Accompany Billy and Bonita on their adventure and help them win this game of Cat and Mouse.
● The cutest villain ever: protect Mouse Town from a mischievous cat.

Mouse House is FREE to play, and also contains some real money in app purchases.
